text: Copy, paste, and cut with keyboard shortcuts
about: Copy, paste, and cut with keyboard shortcuts in Microsoft Word

text: delete entire word at a time
about: use ctrl+backspace to delete entire word at a time in MS Word

text: insert links into document using keyboard shortcuts
about: ctrl+k shortcut used to insert links quickly in documents in MS Word

text: use smart lookup to search the internet
